response.overview: Atlantic – R2 725175, Atlantic – 603497831715, Rhino Records (2) – R2 725175, Rhino Records (2) – 603497831715 CD, Album, Reissue, Remastered, Stereo CD, Album, Reissue, Stereo CD, Remastered, Stereo CD, Stereo Blu-ray, Blu-ray Audio, Album, Reissue, Remastered, Stereo, Multichannel LP, Album, Reissue, Remastered, Stereo Deluxe Edition Europe 2023 Rock Prog Rock Definitive version of the 1971 The Yes Album. The box set contains the remastered original album from 1971 on CD & LP, two CDs with rarities and live recordings as well as a new Steven Wilson mix including additional instrumental versions on CD in stereo and on Blu-ray Disc Dolby Atmos. The Blu-ray Disc is not available individually but only in the "Super Deluxe" box set.
response.title: Yes - The Yes Album - 1971 (Blu-Ray Audio)
